* Biomass lifted a brow as Perndabot answered him, thinking that this bot 
was obviously some kind of dolt compaired to the rest of his crew, even 
they, he could bet, knew more about this ship and their commander then he 
did.
Biomass stepped closer to Perndabot.*

" Then take us to him."

* Biomass was pushing his luck with a big bot like Perndabot, but he wanted 
to know just how far he could take this guy before he got aggressive.
Biomass wasn't a small bot and he was only 5 ft smaller then this one, a 
fight could be interesting but for the moment he was trying to place his 
authority as quickly as he could in this faction.*

* Nue'e looked at Biomass with a look that told him not to push his luck.*

.......................................

* Tremmer, being blind, doesn't see Grimmler motion for him to follow but 
his nose picked up the scent of the Maximal moving away and decides to 
follow all the same. Moving to four legs he starts moving towards him, his 
nose always to the ground to make sure that he could smell if something was 
ahead of him so he wouldn't run into it.*

" Maximals ain't ever had it easy, kid."

* Tremmer walked up so that he was right along side Grimmler.*

" Never will. Just gotta take it as it is."
